name: Hack N' Run
description:
-Made For The MizJam-

Hack and Slash as you rack up points while hundreds of harmless look alikes run away from you.

A fast paced Hack N' Slash game, using the MizJam asset pack made by Kenny

Controls:

W and Up Arrow Key: Jump

A/D and Left/Right Arrow Keys: Move

Space Bar: Attack

----------------------------------------------

This game is incredibly incomplete, I lost motivation pretty quickly and ended up abandoning the project until the very end. 

----------------------------------------------
